1.0.3: Updated links to JIRA documentation to open in new tab.
1.0.4: Fixed issue with JIRA API scopes when obtaining labels.
1.0.5: Fixed issue with JIRA API scopes when obtaining reporters.
1.0.6: NewIssue, UpdatedIssue: now works with timezones correctly.
1.0.8: CreateIssue, UpdateIssue: Assignee field now only display assignees available for the project in the selection. The endpoint used for creating fields of both components has been updated to no longer use the deprecated one.
